name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior PHP Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **PHP**, **Magento**, **Laravel**, and **Alpine.js**. Proficient in **API** development, ensuring robust integrations and seamless user experiences. Skilled in implementing **Git** for version control and utilizing **JIRA** for efficient project management.

Solid expertise in **React**, allowing for dynamic and responsive web applications. Experienced in agile methodologies, collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive project success. Demonstrated ability to deploy applications on **AWS**, leveraging cloud services to enhance scalability and performance.

In addition to core PHP skills, possess hands-on experience with **Flutter**, **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and various backend technologies including **FastAPI** and **Django**. Proven track record in building AI/ML-powered platforms and maintaining compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
